From: Lea Chemit <lea@highfiveevents.net> 
Sent: Tuesday, 11 February 2025 6:42 PM
To: Bahi Rifai <bahi@highfiveevents.net>
Subject: DCG 2025 - FINAL FINAL SCHEDULES

 

CAUTION: This email originated from outside of the organization. Do not click links or open attachments unless you recognize the sender and know the content is safe. 
تم إرسال هذا البريد الإلكتروني من خارج مجموعة شلهوب. لا تنقر على الروابط أو تفتح المرفقات إلا إذا كنت تعرف المرسل وتعلم أنه آمن

Dear all,

 

We hope this email finds you well. 

Please find attached the FINAL FINAL VERSIONS of the schedules, after some last minute minor changes and adjustments we had to make due to some mistakes on our side. 

 

We have highlighted the changes and corrections in yellow, everything else remains the same. 

The affected schedules are mainly Padel Men and Ladies, Badminton Men and Ladies, Table Football, Ladies Basketball, and Backgammon, but please send again all of them to your employees. 

These versions of the schedules are now being uploaded on the app, which will be ready by Friday.

The affected schedules are mainly Padel Men and Ladies, Badminton Men and Ladies, Table Football, Ladies Basketball, and Backgammon, but please send again all of them to your employees. 

These versions of the schedules are now being uploaded on the app, which will be ready by Friday.

 

There seems to have been some confusion about the Volleyball schedules, the schedules now mention what day the matches are to be played (Saturday or Sunday). 

 

In addition, and directly on the schedules, we have updated the location for Cycling and Long distance Running competitions, taking place at Meydan Track. 

You will find 2 location pins: one for access by car to the dirt road, leading to the starting point. The second pin is for the actual starting point. 

Participants can park their car close to the starting point. 

 

Regarding the parking at the main venue, 2 parking options:

1) Big dirt parking lot next to the Padel building, and should that become full

2) There is an overflow parking on the other side of the road, opposite side of Starbucks

 

Just a reminder, water will be available for everyone throughout the event, courtesy of our hydration partner, Oasis Water. 

 

Looking forward to seeing you all at the Games!

 

Best regards,

Bahi & Léa

 

-- 

Léa Chemit 

tel: 971 04 326 0640 

mob: 971 58 5929415
